name: Steve's Revolution!
description:
The revolutionists are in so much rage they have lost all self control. They can't see the danger in front of them, and are walking to their deaths. Steve, a Safety Cone, is committed to protecting the revolutionists by putting his body on the line. Use Steve and his cone army to protect revolutionists from danger by placing cones in their way, and ensure they get to their destination safely.

The map is randomly generated every time, so no two playing experiences will be the same... Probably.

Made by Sam Chaba, Jamie Noble, and Thomas Ballantyne.
